Title: Citizen Assistance Mission
Text:
Officer Reynolds has tasked me with assisting three citizens who have reported incidents requiring police intervention. Each citizen is located at a different area in Gramados City. I must find and speak with each of them to gather information about their respective situations.

- Ms. Beatrice Johnson is located at the corner of Jorty Street and Comenial Street, south of the airport Hotel, in front of the airport.
- Mr. Robert Anderson can be found at the Marina Vista Caf√© & Grill, situated at the Marina Bay Building, closest to the University.
- Ms. Sophia Rodriguez is situated at Serenity Court, a fancy courtyard in the Downtown district, at the North-West, near the Bravo Fuel Station.
CompleteText: I have successfully spoken with each of the citizens in need of assistance. Ms. Beatrice Johnson provided details about a bag theft incident, Mr. Robert Anderson reported a vehicle theft, and Ms. Sophia Rodriguez recounted an assault at Serenity Court. Now, I must return to the Gramados Police Station to report my findings to Officer Reynolds and receive further instructions.
